announcements.details: Read the commentary on the readings for the 3rd Sunday in Ordinary Time.
announcements.title: Commentary: 3rd Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 2nd February, 2025. Offertory will be led by the Sacred Heart of Jesus Confraternity and the Friday borns respectively. Bidding Prayers will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: Presentation of the Lord

announcements.details: There will be In His Presence on Sunday, 26th January 2025 at 6pm. In attendance, will be Team Jesus.
announcements.title: In His Presence

announcements.details: There will be a revival from 5th-7th February 2025 at 7pm each night right here at the church
announcements.title: Revival

announcements.details: Life in the Spirit Seminar starts on Sunday 16th February, 2025. Registration is still ongoing at the church.
announcements.title: Life in the Spirit Seminar

announcements.details: The St Bakhita Marriage School will reopen early February, 2025. Prospective counselees who wish to have their marriages solemnized in 2025 should please pick up registration forms from the office of the Rector.
announcements.title: St Bakhita Marriage School
